info.title: groov View Public API
info.description:
#### Revised: 2019-11-21

### Overview
groov View Public API revision 1.

tags.name: info
tags.description: Provides information about groov View itself.

tags.name: whoami
tags.description: Provides information about the user you are authenticated as.

tags.name: data-store
tags.description: Provides access to the Data Store devices and tags.

tags.name: logging
tags.description: Access to groov View's event log.

get.description: Get information about groov View. No authorization required.
List devices available in the data store. Authorized for admins and editors.
List tags of the given device. Authorized for admins and editors.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the device to use.

post.description: Read selected tags from the data store. Authorized for admins and editors.

requestBody.description: Tag references for the tags to read.

get.description: Read the current value of a single tag. Authorized for admins and editors.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tag to read.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Table index to start reading at.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of elements to read from a table.

get.description: List all data store tags defined in the project. Authorized for admins and editors.

post.description: Writes a new value to the given tag. Authorized for admins and editors.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tag to write.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to write to the tag. Must be a string, number, or boolean.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: For array tags, the index to write the value to.

get.description: Downloads the complete groov View log in JSON format. Added in groov View R4.2a.

parameters.name: minimum-log-level
parameters.description: How verbose the log should be.

parameters.name: last-timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest time to include in the log. Value is milliseconds since January 1, 1970 UTC.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Optional string to search for in the log.

get.description: Downloads the complete groov View log. Added in groov View R4.2a.

parameters.name: minimum-log-level
parameters.description: How verbose the log should be.

parameters.name: last-timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest time to include in the log. Value is milliseconds since January 1, 1970 UTC.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Optional string to search for in the log.

get.description: Get information about the user you are authenticated as. Authorized for admins, editors, operators, and kiosk.

needsPasswordChange.description: True if your password is expired

dataStoreDevice.description: A Data Store device within a groov View project

device.description: A generic device within a groov View project

groovAdminVersion.description: The groov Admin version number if running on a groov hardware box

groovBoxDescription.description: The groov box type (GROOV-AT1, GROOV-AR1, or GRV-EPIC-PR1)

groovNodeRedVersion.description: The node red version number if running on a GROOV-AR1 which has node red installed

isGroovBox.description: True if running on a groov hardware box

isGroovBoxSetup.description: True if running on a groov hardware box which has been setup or true if running on groov Server for Windows

isLicenseValid.description: True if a license is installed, valid, and not expired

licenseType.description: The license type (NONE, MAINTENANCE_EXPIRED, or VALID)

minimumApiVersion.description: The minimum supported API version number

shouldShowTrialDialog.description: True if the trial dialog pops up when logging into groov View

timezoneOffset.description: The server's timezone offset from UTC in minutes

trialPeriodExpiration.description: Milliseconds until trial period is expired

warVersion.description: The version number of the war

count.description: For array tags, the number of elements to read, starting at index.

index.description: For array tags, the index to start reading at.
